description: An example dashboard for displaying prometheus metrics from an AmbientWeather local server.

options.content:
# AmbientWeather Local Server Dashboard

## Filters

Filters can be applied to view different subsets of the data.

* Datasource - Your Prometheus Datasource
* WeatherStation - if you have more than one station, you can filter by MAC address here
* WeatherStationType - if you have more than one station, you can filter by the Station Model here
* MeasurementType - Indoor/Outdoor, etc
* Source - where the metric originated from, i.e. Local vs. Cloud. You will only have data from the Cloud if you have enabled AWN enrichment

## Container Events Annotations

A toggle is provided for displaying docker container events as annotations.  This toggle requires you have [DocGraf](https://github.com/philosowaffle/docgraf) running and reporting these events.

list.description: Whether the metric originated from the local Console or the Cloud
list.name: Source

title: AmbientWeather Local Server
